definitions.example: They let down the rope and I fastened it to the basket.

definitions.definition: To disappoint; to betray or fail somebody
definitions.example: I promised him I would meet him there, and I will not let him down.

definitions.definition: (of clothing) To lengthen by undoing and resewing a hem.
To reduce one's level of effort.

definitions.example: to let down tools or cutlery
